SEARCH
Package smarthome.controller

Class GetReadingsFromDeviceController

java.lang.Object
smarthome.controller.GetReadingsFromDeviceController
public class GetReadingsFromDeviceController extends Object
This class represents the controller responsible for getting readings from a device in a given period. The main method of this class is getReadingsFromDeviceInAGivenPeriod, which receives a deviceDTO and a periodDTO and returns a list of readingDTOs.

  • Constructor Details

    • GetReadingsFromDeviceController

      public GetReadingsFromDeviceController (IReadingService readingService, ReadingMapper readingMapper, PeriodMapper periodMapper, DeviceMapper deviceMapper)
      Constructor of the GetReadingsFromDeviceController.
      Parameters:
      readingService - the service that will be used to get the readings.
      readingMapper - the mapper that will be used to map the readings.
      periodMapper - the mapper that will be used to map the period.
      deviceMapper - the mapper that will be used to map the device.

  • Method Details

    • getReadingsFromDeviceInAGivenPeriod

      public List<ReadingDTO> getReadingsFromDeviceInAGivenPeriod (DeviceDTO deviceDTO, PeriodDTO periodDTO)
      This method receives a deviceDTO and a periodDTO and returns a list of readingDTOs.
      Parameters:
      deviceDTO - the device from which the readings will be retrieved.
      periodDTO - the period in which the readings will be retrieved.
      Returns:
      a list of readingDTOs or null if the parameters are invalid.
